example.description: This example describes the specified network ACL.

example.code:
PS C:\> (Get-EC2NetworkAcl -NetworkAclId acl-12345678).Entries
CidrBlock : 0.0.0.0/0 Egress : True IcmpTypeCode : PortRange : Protocol : -1 RuleAction : deny RuleNumber : 32767
CidrBlock : 0.0.0.0/0 Egress : False IcmpTypeCode : PortRange : Protocol : -1 RuleAction : deny RuleNumber : 32767
example.description: This example describes the rules for the specified network ACL.
This example describes all your network ACLs.
